                                 int x,
                                 int y)
        Get an image icon from icon path at the x and y index from panel
        Parameters:
        path - String - Icon path
        x - int - The horizontal index (in px)
        y - int - The vertical index (in px)
        Returns:
        ImageIcon - The image icon get from the icon

          boolean armed,
          boolean ringing)
        Update the graphics components in dependence of the alarm clock states
        Parameters:
        date - Date - The current date
        armed - boolean - If the alarm clock is armed
        ringing - boolean - If the alarm clock is ringing
